GroIMP
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which GroIMP installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using GroIMP, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load GroIMP/1.5-Java-1.8
```
